headline: S&P Global Balances Dividend Strength With AI And Private Market Push
summary: S&P Global (NYSE:SPGI) reported strong revenue and operating margin growth in its latest update. The company announced its 53rd consecutive year of dividend increases, extending a long dividend track record. Management unveiled new initiatives in AI and private markets that are intended to support future business development. S&P Global sits at the center of benchmarks, ratings, and data that many investors rely on, and its latest moves point to meaningful activity at the corporate level...

headline: US Stock Market Today S&P 500 Futures Edge Higher As Jobs Data Looms
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Wednesday, Feb, 11 2026 US stock futures are pointing slightly higher this morning, with E-mini S&P 500 contracts up about 0.2% and Nasdaq-100 minis up roughly 0.2%, as investors look ahead to fresh clues on how the US economy is really holding up. The key pieces on their radar are the January jobs report, where non farm payrolls are expected to show 70,000 new positions and unemployment steady at 4.4%, and the December retail sales data, which...

headline: S&P Global Shares Dragged by Market’s “Most Bearish Possible” AI Anxieties
